evidence: README indicates network usage: "This repository has been archived as all code is now maintained as part of [blobtoolkit/blobtoolkit](https://github.com/blobtoolkit/blobtoolkit) under `src/api`, `src/viewer` and `src/packaged-viewer`"

"BlobToolKit Viewer is a genome-scale dataset visualistion tool developed as part of the blobtoolkit project to allow browser-based identification and filtering of target and non-target data in genome assemblies."

"We are running the BlobToolKit insdc-pipeline on all public (INSDC registered) eukaryote genome assemblies and making the results available in an instance of this viewer at https://blobtoolkit.genomehubs.org/view/."
